sentences.sContent: ‘Did he really?’ Her surprise seemed genuine.
sentences.sCn: “他真的这样？”她好像是真的惊讶。

sentences.sContent: ...Theintimate nature of genuine criticism implies something about who is able to give it...
...Sometimes people cannot cry despite genuine grief...

remMethod.val: genu(出生， 产生) ＋ ine(…的) → 来源清楚的 → 真正的

trans.tranCn: 真的， 真正的； 真诚的
trans.tranOther: a genuine feeling, desire etc is one that you really feel, not one you pretend to feel
